episode: I feel like even when I'm not alone, that I am alone and forgotten.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I feel alone a lot of the time even when I'm not alone.  I just feel forgotten a lot and that no one really cares about how my day went even though I hear about everyone else's day.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really tough. Feeling invisible can be painful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is, and I'm not sure how to overcome it, especially with my husband.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Have you tried talking to him about how you feel?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: yes, he will tell me he will try to do a better job at taking some time out of his day to ask about my day but he usually forgets or will wait until he's ready to roll over and go to sleep at the end of the day.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It sounds like his efforts aren't quite translating into consistent action.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I agree and it's left me stuck as I don't know what to do or say to get things to be more consistent and not feel like I'm forcing him to ask.  I just feel like at the end of the day all he cares about is seeing that I haven't just up and left him.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must feel really unfulfilling and like you're just an afterthought.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: very much so.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's like you're craving emotional connection, but it's not being met.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: That is exactly it.  I bring up to him at least once I month that I don't feel like we have a connection but most of the time he'll just say sorry or essentially change the subject.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It sounds like he's not really hearing you or taking your concerns seriously.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yep, that's what it feels like.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really frustrating and invalidating.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Agreed.  It doesn't help my already lacking self esteem either.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's like a vicious cycle, reinforcing your negative feelings about yourself.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must be really hard to deal with.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It truly is.  Some days I just feel like a shell of my self.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds incredibly draining and sad.
